website_summaries.verdict: The Logitech Keyboard Case for the iPad 2 does exactly what it promises, offering a highly portable Bluetooth keyboard for use with an iPad; however, it's a better keyboard than it is a case.
pros: Lightweight design, a well-constructed, compact keyboard, and its function as a travel case make the Logitech Keyboard Case for iPad 2 easy to pack
cons: The keys are inevitably more cramped than on a full-size keyboard, and the case offers no protection for the iPad 2's back and can't be easily put on and taken off when commuting

customer_reviews.title: Excellent addition to iPad2
customer_reviews.text: This keyboard is perfect for the iPad2. It's made of aluminum, closes over the face of the iPad when not in use (puts iPad to sleep), and is a well-balanced platform for iPad use when not on a table or desk. I was afraid the keyboard would be too small to use effectively since it's the same width as the iPad, but it operates flawlessly. It's SOOOO much easier to type with this than using the on-screen keyboard. Five stars! Excellenet product. PS - terrific battery life as well.
customer_reviews.author: Arelunde

customer_reviews.title: Logitech Keyboard Case
customer_reviews.text: This keyboard has never worked correctly. I've had communication with the seller about a refund, to no avail. The latest information was for me to notify Amazon since it was still under warrenty. I feel that the seller, Chainspell, should consider a refund. i would gladly send this keyboard back to them. This is the first Logitech Keyboard Case that hasn't met my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: margy

customer_reviews.title: ... for over a year now and it still works great! You can always count on Logitech to make ...
customer_reviews.text: I've had this keyboard for over a year now and it still works great! You can always count on Logitech to make good products that last a long time. I get compliments on how cool it is and how amazingly sturdy it is almost on a daily basis! It protects my ipad really well, and I can fit both of them together into my ipad sleeve and take it everywhere I go! The battery charge for the keyboard lasts for months, even when I forget to switch it to the "off" mode! This was worth every penny, and if I buy another ipad, I'll buy another one of these keyboards to go with it!
customer_reviews.author: Toreo

customer_reviews.title: Arrived broken
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this as a Christmas gift for my husband. Unfortunately, one of the keys was unattached when it arrived, which I didn't notice until he opened it on Christmas morning. I like the size and features, and I would have rated it even higher if it had been an easier exchange. Amazon was great in facilitating the return; I printed the return form, put it in the box, and left it on my front porch, and they scheduled USPS to pick it up. I haven't received the refund yet, but when I do, I'll order another keyboard.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Peice of crap.
customer_reviews.text: I can't tell you how much gimicky crap I buy because the price is right. Well,this was not one of those purchases. I thought I would get something useful for $99. Its a piece of crap at any price. There is a piece of rubber glued into the groove that keeps the ipad in place. it takes one humid summer for the rubber strip to comes off. It will invariably happen right after the return period expires. Save your money.
customer_reviews.author: Damuri

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this classic case. Love the tactile feel and responsiveness. Some complain about the sharp edges that hold the tablet to the iPad. Love I can quick go from Landscape to Portrait without a case removal. I can also use a skin on the front and back of the tablet for added protection. Works great as a food tray when I need a flat surface. WARNING... do not clean with a "ShopVac" vacuum.... the keys will detach. Mine is held together with scotch tape now....

customer_reviews.title: Okay Product, Two Cons
customer_reviews.text: This keyboard served me well for nearly two years before I spilled water on it and sent it to its death. Two cons: The lip on the front edge of the keyboard can bite into your wrist as your typing which I really disliked. Also, the iPad didn't attach to the case which meant that it was hard to use the keyboard when it was balanced on your lap. When I broke this one, I moved to a ClamCase which I find to be worth the additional money.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonBuyer11

customer_reviews.title: I bought this same item twice and have no regrets except for spilling water on the first one.
customer_reviews.text: This is my second time buying this keyboard, since I spilled water on my first one. The only drawback is you don't quite know when the battery is really low. It just stops working and you have to plug it into a computer. I wish it just plugged into the wall? Otherwise, it's stylish and adds durability and protection to your ipad if you travel with it. I really like this product and it's priced correctly.
customer_reviews.author: Star C.

customer_reviews.title: Great product but don't buy here.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this keyboard back in December and LOVED it. I used it everyday and up to this point have never had to charge it. This week, it wouldn't work and the keyboard light indicators weren't on. Thinking it needed to charge, I followed the directions and left it over night to charge off of my laptop. I was disappointed when I found it had not charged. After two days of fruitless charging I gave up and contacted the company that I bought it through on Amazon (Royal Distributors). As of yet, they have not returned my email. I'll update with their response, should I get one.
customer_reviews.author: ND Horton

customer_reviews.title: keyboard works well
customer_reviews.text: The keys are large and easy to use. Ipad sits nicely in its slot. But you do have to be careful. The pad can slip out of the slot easily if you move a little. When closing the case I was pleasantly surprised on how snug it fit and how well it holds without magnets. May not be quite as nice as the $100 ones are but for $49 dollars its perfect. I tried the $100 keyboard at the Apple store. Seems to be the same keyboard without magnets. I can type fast with it with little mistakes.
customer_reviews.author: Calvin J Hill Jr

customer_reviews.title: I don't know if they still sell this thing, if they do, buy it!
customer_reviews.text: I won the iPad in a contest and gave it to my wife. Having a keyboard for an iPad means she doesn't need a laptop computer and now the iPad does EVERYTHING for her. Great purchase, batteries last for weeks and the iPad stays in the tray pretty well. Don't be stupid, realize gravity and friction are the only things that hold it in place, but if you can figure that out you will enjoy the product. If you can't figure that out you really shouldn't be using a computer anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: The best option hands down
customer_reviews.text: I travel a lot with my ipad and I am always trying to streamline everything that I have to carry with me. This product is terrific. Whatever shortcomings it may have are exceeded by the fact that it is light weight, incredibly durable, has great battery life, and a good cover. True the back of your Ipad2 is not covered and can get scratched, but I tried the highly rated ILuv keyboard case and it added to much bulk and was much more of a hassle to use. I have recommended this product to several people and they all swear by it
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Great product but with few quality issues
customer_reviews.text: I have been using it about a year and it's been a great gadget for my iPad. Good connectivity with iPad, very responsive, comfortable keyboard and the battery lasts pretty long. However, the one of the key fell off (the - key), and the ipad does not hold up when placed on the slot, and it falls back. I am not sure when the next key will go out, and also, I got to figure out a way to make the iPad stay in the slot without falling back. If anyone has a quick fix on preventing the iPad from falling back from the slot it supposed to, please let me know.
customer_reviews.author: Y. Chong

customer_reviews.title: One of better options
customer_reviews.text: Nice protection one one side but leaves back side of pad open to scratches. Set up is easy and works reliably I found it too bulky and mostly was bothered by edges of the case causing discomfort and reducing typing speed and went back to the origami standcase for an apple keyboard. I find this the best option for me. However this case has better stability of the pad I would say this is the second best option I have used or seen but am staying with the origami
customer_reviews.author: Obithedog

customer_reviews.title: Logitech iPad2 keyboard
customer_reviews.text: I used the ZAGG keyboard for my iPad1 so when I switched to iPad2 I ordered again: only this time it was Logitech/ZAGG. For longer Emails this set up more convenient than the virtual keyboard. Looks good: using the keyboard and as cover. Only negative: when using iPad mainly for reading or games (handheld in plane, outside etc.) I have an extra piece laying around and that's cumbersome. This set up works best with a table, desk etc.
customer_reviews.author: Teunis D. Baas

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing. I like not having half a keyboard covering my screen when I am typing info in. It lasts forever (well, at least an awesome long time) on a charge, and charges quickly. I have seen others spend much more money for what they have, and they all like mine. I got one as a gift two years ago, and finally one button got knocked off. My wife got me another one, and I got her an iPad and the Logitech for Christmas. I literally use it 2-3 hours a day writing reports and stuff, and never had a problem. Good product, I'd buy another if I ever need to...
customer_reviews.author: martin pilewski

customer_reviews.title: Works very well
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately it required removing the case that was protecting the back of my iPad 2 so I know it will no longer stay as pristine s it was. But iy's a huge time saver when entering text and has several keys that make navigating quick and easy. Would've given it 5 stars if it had protection for the back if the iPad. But I certainly don't regret the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: R. Grindeland

customer_reviews.title: excellent keyboard with tactile touch in a small format
customer_reviews.text: excellent keyboard with tactile touch in a small format. Provides excellent drop protection as well. I liked my first one so much that when these went on sale I bought two more for friends and neighbours who also have this i-pad format.
customer_reviews.author: Bargain Hunter

customer_reviews.title: When it works...
customer_reviews.text: I've tried not to be disappointed with this Bluetooth keypad and case, but I give up. I did not purchase this item for the case, but purchased it for the keypad and stand. I use this at work. The problem with this product is that the Bluetooth connection between the keypad and iPad constantly breaks requring me to turn the keypad off and then back on. If it could keep the connection, I would have given it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: LOVE and worth every $$
customer_reviews.text: I'm using it right now and I love it- it doubles as a case and protects the screen. It's super light weight and packes neatly in any bag that pits an ipad. It also hold a charge for a LONG time. Can't say enough about this.. You get the best price on Amazon- much less than at the Apple store and at the ATT store and basically the same unit.
customer_reviews.author: ASW

customer_reviews.title: No regrets on this purchase :)  Well worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a gift for my recently-fascinated-with-technology 75 year old mom. It's been a lifesaver, allowing her to type more comfortably than with the touchscreen. Typing numbers is no longer a pain (a lot of numbers when entering your address book data). She was able to install/sync it without any problem. Absolutely no regrets with this purchase! (FYI-the black tab that supports the back of the iPad appears fragile. Be gentle with it. The reason why I did not give 5 stars)
customer_reviews.author: MLY

customer_reviews.title: a little bit delicate
customer_reviews.text: After about 16 moths, the buttons on the key pad started to fall off.
customer_reviews.author: Robert C. Donovan

customer_reviews.title: Solid Keyboard
customer_reviews.text: The keyboard itslelf is very solid and has a feel almost as natural as the Apple blue tooth keyboard. The outer shell almost matches the rear color of the iPad 2. It does add some bulk to the unit. The only drawback I have is that you cannot turn the iPad over and place inside the device if you are just trying to do something on the go.
customer_reviews.author: DivoSmurf

customer_reviews.title: Great keyboard case
customer_reviews.text: I love this keyboard case - it is sturdy and protects my iPad2. Keyboard is easy to use despite being a bit smaller than standard size. I highly recommned this product. The more expensive leather fold over with removable keyboard went back to the store.
customer_reviews.author: Jen555

customer_reviews.title: It's a great little keyboard for the iPad 2
customer_reviews.text: It's a great little keyboard for the iPad 2. The only thing that is a little bad is where my hands sit on the hard corners while typing.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan L.

customer_reviews.title: Not durable. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: Great in theory but TWO keys have already fallen off in just two days of use at a conference. Unfortunately, I tossed the box after I saw that it worked, so can't return it, but I would definitely NOT recommend this keyboard.
customer_reviews.author: M. Frese

customer_reviews.title: super
customer_reviews.text: This has made using the iPad so much more enjoyable. I was having a hard time typing with the keypad on the screen. While it takes a little time to get used to it is well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: S. Dotty

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: This product is too small to type on. Beware that this does a good job serving as both a case and keyboard, only problem is that the keys are incredibly small and very difficult to type on.
customer_reviews.author: NL

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend
customer_reviews.text: This item met my expectations. It was pretty simple to connect to my iPad however you cannot use the designated space for the iPad if it has any type of silicone cover. It is still a great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: MovieMonday

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: Works fine but the IPad has a tendency to fall out of the indent every so often.
customer_reviews.author: Adrian

customer_reviews.title: The keyboard itself is great. It arrived with one key having fallen off ...
customer_reviews.text: The keyboard itself is great. It arrived with one key having fallen off and we can never get it to actually click into place. If it weren't for that key I'd give it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Longshotlisa

customer_reviews.title: Solid product
customer_reviews.text: Highly protective of edges and face when in a carry on or packed. Good battery life and sound construction.
customer_reviews.author: Dee Blackmer

customer_reviews.title: keyboard case perfect for iPad 2
customer_reviews.text: My cousin gave me an iPad 2 and showed me her Logitech keyboard case. Then she told me how much she paid. I went on Amazon and got it for 1/2 that amount! Arrived quickly looking exactly as expected. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: S. Starlin

customer_reviews.title: Not very good because my IPad isn't as secured it falls out ...
customer_reviews.text: Not very good because my IPad isn't as secured it falls out of the Logitech the 1st Logitech I bought had a little flap that came up to support the iPad that made a world of a difference because when I am pressing on my iPad it falls off the Logitech as well
customer_reviews.author: Melissa A Santos

customer_reviews.title: Great help for an iPad user
customer_reviews.text: My husband has a degenerative brain disorder and he wanted a computer. My solution was an iPad with the Logitech Keyboard case. He loves it. It is easy for him to use and he can store it in his drawer at the nursing home. He reads magazines and newspapers and can check his email using the keyboard. What a great combination. I would have given it 5 stars if it came with a simple manual.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Marcus

customer_reviews.title: Very cool-- a bit hard to type
customer_reviews.text: Definitely a neat product. Works great as a case--particularly for travel/durability. The only issue is complete easy of typing--definitely takes getting used to. It's hard to adjust from using a normal-sized keyboard--it's also easy to forget that normal apple keyboard commands don't work (although this is true with all ipad keyboards, I believe). The battery life could be a lot longer. Worth having--particularly if you practice typing and can get a rhythm going.
customer_reviews.author: CPG

customer_reviews.title: Nice for when you want to type
customer_reviews.text: I can comfortably type with it, much faster than I can with the virtual keyboard. Long battery (charge) life.
customer_reviews.author: Roger Rohweder

customer_reviews.title: I love this iPad Keyboard Case for iPad2
customer_reviews.text: This keyboard is terrific! It is slim and lightweight, with the iPad folding into it when its not being used. Much faster typing on this than on the iPad alone! Doesn't need charging very often.
customer_reviews.author: Mitchna

customer_reviews.title: fits great
customer_reviews.text: easy to use keyboard. easy to set up. covers and protects the ipad when not in use. very durable; great product.
customer_reviews.author: Chris D.

customer_reviews.title: Very good keyboard
customer_reviews.text: works as a regular keyboard and adds a strong protection to my IPad
customer_reviews.author: Raypa

customer_reviews.title: Great iPad Addition
customer_reviews.text: Easy to connect and set up. Much better than trying to type on the screen and provides great protection to the screen.
customer_reviews.author: Steven A. Harness

customer_reviews.title: Great cover and Better Keyboard
customer_reviews.text: Great cover and Better Keyboard makes the i-Pad much easier to use.
customer_reviews.author: Dinah L. Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Easy typing
customer_reviews.text: As advertised. Good keyboard feel. Holds charge well. While not the best protection available, it is all that I need most of the time.
customer_reviews.author: Looking for Value

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Cover and Keyboard for iPad2
customer_reviews.text: This keyboard makes and excellent hard-cover and keyboard for the iPad2. It has a nice feel, easy configuration, and makes editing anything on the iPad2 that much easier. I would never try to use the on-screen keyboard now that I have this keyboard availabe.
customer_reviews.author: Walter R. Crosby

customer_reviews.title: iPad Keyboard Case
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product! Works great with the iPad 2. Came in perfect condition and makes the iPad 2 much more usable for traditional keyboarders.
customer_reviews.author: carp

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This product does excatly what I need it to do. It's easy to pair and quick to use. The hard cover is perfect to protect my iPad's screen while it's tucked into my purse.
customer_reviews.author: hi

customer_reviews.title: Great accessory!
customer_reviews.text: Just got a new ipad2. My friends suggested that I get the Logitech keyboard. I used their's and really liked the ease of use and the easel feature. Great protector for the face of the ipad2!
customer_reviews.author: dressmaker

customer_reviews.title: A gift for my son
customer_reviews.text: I can't say much about this. It was shipped and received on time. It was a gift for my son and he seems happy with it so that's all I can say. Ha!
customer_reviews.author: Texangirl72

customer_reviews.title: Get this All in One case-Now!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely delighted with this case/stand/bluetooth keyboard by Logitech..Was initially tempted by a few of the higher end leather cases but frankly they weren't nearly as functional, lacked any real cache, and didn't have a blue tooth enabled keyboard...all in one package! Seriously, you can't do better.
customer_reviews.author: Erwin J. Malzer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The edges are awkward to type with if you have large hands.
customer_reviews.author: Paul, the DIYer

customer_reviews.title: Supply a longer cable
customer_reviews.text: Excellent keyboard, the cable to charge it is a little rediculous. Like 6 inches not even, forget using it while plugged in.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: GOOD
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in good time and hassle recommend 100% . . . . . . . . . . . . . .
customer_reviews.author: gennaro guirados

customer_reviews.title: Por quality
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two of these keyboards. The first one had a letter that stuck and I had to return it immediately. The second one has stopped working less than 2 months.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Exceeds expectations at a great price.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for email and some light coding while on the go. I couldn't ask more for the price. Battery life is good, not great but for the money you'll have trouble finding anything comparable.
customer_reviews.author: C. Eder

customer_reviews.title: It is awesome!!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second one of these keyboards. It is awesome!!
customer_reviews.author: Janelle McAden

customer_reviews.title: excellent accessory
customer_reviews.text: I've owned this for about a month now. Everything seems to be good. The case is solid and the keyboard is easier to type on than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Piece of crap like most logitech products
customer_reviews.text: Piece of crap like most logitech products. Battery failed in one year. No warranty coverage available. Be ready to toss it after a few months. Better solution is a quality keyboard completely separate from iPad.
customer_reviews.author: David Gardener

customer_reviews.title: Great keyboard
customer_reviews.text: This keyboard is good for several reasons, fits my ipad2 perfectly is great for protection when using as cover to the screen, is a snug fit so it will not come off accidentally. is great to use if you are tired of trying to type on the ipad itself, gives the feel as a small laptop keyboard so if you are not used to typing on a small keyboard may take a little bit of getting used to.
customer_reviews.author: D. Wilhelm

customer_reviews.title: My son loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Great for carrying to and from school, with built-in keyboard. Price was right and works great! Order yours today, especially if you transport it often.
customer_reviews.author: Jayne C.

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: We purchased 4 of these to go with the iPad II. These are taken into the field for interviewing. Good product.
customer_reviews.author: SUZANNE

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: it made a lot of things very easier than before when I didn't have this product for ipad.
customer_reviews.author: yerinkim

customer_reviews.title: Logitech Keyboard Case for iPad 2
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this keyboard case!! Prior to receiving this keyboard I didn't use my ipad2 as much as my laptop. This makes my ipad2 as easy to use as my laptop--it has ipad2 specific keys which makes it so much easier to navigate the ipad2. Further, keyboard case protects the ipad2 perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki O

customer_reviews.title: works great, especially for the price
customer_reviews.text: Was exactly how described, works great, especially for the price. I am going to be buying a lot more from you all!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: protection and great feel
customer_reviews.text: I love this keyboard. It works perfectly with my iPad, and feels like a regular keyboard- Moreover, it provides nice protection for the iPad. Great investment
customer_reviews.author: pink delight

customer_reviews.title: Keyboard provides Protection, turns iPad into productive work laptop
customer_reviews.text: I have loved the Logitech Keyboard. The hard case protects the iPad and the lip is deep enough to provide security and give me the height I need.
customer_reviews.author: Ker4You

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I don't use this much but it's great for the price. Easy to use, easy to type.
customer_reviews.author: mbissi

customer_reviews.title: iPad 2 keyboard case
customer_reviews.text: This case is exactly what I was looking for. It's easy to use and provides a great protective shell for my iPad.
customer_reviews.author: Maysa Antonia

customer_reviews.title: Falls out
customer_reviews.text: The keyboard doesn't hold the iPad adequately. My iPad falls out regularly, and once it cracked. I wouldn't recommend this product under any circumstances.
customer_reviews.author: DavidToll

customer_reviews.title: Product works as expcted - Replaced no problem
customer_reviews.text: I had a used one with a stuck key. Company replaced it no problem. Works as expected except I sometimes I have to disable blue tooth to get the onscreen keyboard back.
customer_reviews.author: Diana Schnitzer

customer_reviews.title: Great Keyboard I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable durable protects my ipad 2 very well (I added a cover to the polished back of the Ipad). This is the best ipad keyboard I have owned.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Owen

customer_reviews.title: iPad2 Logitech Keyboard Case  - very happy with!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great case & keyboard. It is lightweight and travels well making use of the iPad more productive & efficient.
customer_reviews.author: Cole1235

customer_reviews.title: Logitech keyboard case for iPad 2
customer_reviews.text: This thing is pretty slick. Nice keyboard, very helpful, even on my lap. doesn't work with all apps, don't know who to blame for that.
customer_reviews.author: barbara kinnison

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I gave this five stars because not only does it work the way a new one does, but it also looks brand spanking new.
customer_reviews.author: Wondermutt

customer_reviews.title: Good product but keys can work loose
customer_reviews.text: Protects keyboard and makes typing faster and easier. It is too easy to dislodge keys. Great for the low price.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Carson

customer_reviews.title: Like it
customer_reviews.text: TThis product met all expectations. The added weight is offset by the solid protection it offers to the I Pad. I totally endorse.
customer_reviews.author: James G. Skala

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loves it
customer_reviews.text: I gave this as a birthday present to my very busy executive daughter. She loves it and so does her 7 year old who mails Nana on her Mom's IPad. They both say it so much easier now.
customer_reviews.author: KatnTexas

customer_reviews.title: Great keyboard solution but..
customer_reviews.text: I like the keyboard because it looks good and it adds functions to the iPad such as a Home key, music volume and cut/paste. Also, it shuts off the screen when closed which was not true using the iLuv keyboard. However, I see folks using a rubber rim to keep their iPads from sliding and wonder if that might be a more functional system instead. With that and a separate wireless keyboard it would work better in more places such as airplane seats.
customer_reviews.author: P. Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Very functional
customer_reviews.text: Very functional as a keyboard and as a nice sleek case protection. I do not seem to ever have to charge the battery, it lasts a very long time.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Logitech keyboard for iPad 2
customer_reviews.text: The shipment arrived very quickly. Keyboard is great for use on the go. Helps me with my work. Touch of keys feels good.
customer_reviews.author: Daffie

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This Keyboard is very practicle and works very well. The stand is perfect and so is the protection. A very solid product in every way.
customer_reviews.author: thor

customer_reviews.title: New case for ipad2
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this case for my wife's new ipad2. She seems to like it very much. I like it so much I will get the similar one for my ipad.
customer_reviews.author: Wings

customer_reviews.title: Works Well!
customer_reviews.text: Good buy! Would recommend! Easy to connect, not require frequent charging, keys are easy to use! Still need a cover, though.
customer_reviews.author: Texas "T"

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy!
customer_reviews.text: So it worked great for the first 4 months and then died! 4 months!!!!! Pathetic!!! i\I am very disappointed and would not recommend. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Bakoschick

customer_reviews.title: Faulty product
customer_reviews.text: This was a xmas gift for my dad. The keyboard arrived in fine shape, but it did not work (wouldn't connect/link to the ipad2). Very disappointing. HOWEVER, Logitech exchanged it for a new one right away so although it was a pain, it could have been worse.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a present for my husband around a year ago and it gets more useful as time goes on.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Not item as described in amazon posting!
customer_reviews.text: The seller of the item sent a false product - an aftermarket copy that is quite uncomfortable to work with. I contacted seller via email and he requested that I keep item and he would give me a $10 refund. I went and bought an actual Logitech keyboard by Zapp which is very nice to work with/type on and works great. Cheap knock-off warning!
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin R. Luman

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed to pay extra for overnight shipping only to receive an obviously used/repackaged item rather than the new one I paid for. Since I'm traveling today and really needed this, I didn't have other options but Amazon should really watch its "fulfilled by Amazon" stuff to make sure it's as described.

product_meta.title: Logitech 82-Key BlueTooth Wireless Keyboard Case For Apple Ipad 2 920-003393
